id: Schedules/Terms and Conditions of Service of the Officers and Employees of the Board copy
title: Schedule VII: Purposes and Authorized Persons for Rule 22 (Power to Call for Information)
description: Schedule VII supplements Rule 22, which empowers the Data Protection Board of India to call for information from Data Fiduciaries and intermediaries.
